groups.title: Facilitating Works
groups.description: Works that facilitate the carrying out of the rest of the works

elements.title: Toxic/hazardous/contaminated material treatment
elements.description: Treatment of toxic, hazardous or contaminated materials
elements.measurement_rules: Measured in tonnes or m³ depending on material type

sub_elements.title: Removal of asbestos
sub_elements.description: Safe removal and disposal of asbestos materials
sub_elements.measurement_rules: Measured by surface area m² or mass in kg

work_sections.title: Removal of asbestos cement roof sheets
work_sections.description: Careful removal of asbestos cement sheeting from roofs
work_sections.measurement_rules: Measure the surface area of roof covered in asbestos sheets
work_sections.inclusions: Removal, bagging, labelling, temporary weather protection

sub_elements.title: Removal of toxic waste
sub_elements.description: Removal of various toxic waste materials
sub_elements.measurement_rules: Measured by volume m³ or mass in tonnes

work_sections.title: Removal of contaminated soil
work_sections.description: Excavation and removal of chemically contaminated soil
work_sections.measurement_rules: Measure volume in m³ of contaminated soil requiring removal
work_sections.inclusions: Excavation, loading, temporary storage on site

elements.title: Site investigation and temporary support
elements.description: Investigations and temporary works to support main construction
elements.measurement_rules: Measured per item or by linear/area measurement

sub_elements.title: Structural propping and support
sub_elements.description: Temporary support structures for existing buildings
sub_elements.measurement_rules: Measured by linear metre or as a lump sum

work_sections.title: Temporary props to existing walls
work_sections.description: Installation and maintenance of temporary acrow props
work_sections.measurement_rules: Measure linear length of wall requiring temporary support

groups.title: Substructure
groups.description: Works relating to the substructure of buildings

elements.title: Ground works and demolition
elements.description: Site clearance, demolition and ground preparation
elements.measurement_rules: Measured by area, length, volume or mass

sub_elements.title: Site clearance
sub_elements.description: Removal of vegetation, top soil and surface obstruction
sub_elements.measurement_rules: Measured in square metres or hectares

work_sections.title: Strip topsoil and store on site
work_sections.description: Removal and temporary storage of topsoil layer
work_sections.measurement_rules: Measure area of site to be cleared of topsoil

work_sections.title: Clear vegetation and undergrowth
work_sections.description: Removal of bushes, trees and vegetation
work_sections.measurement_rules: Measured by area or individually by number of trees
work_sections.inclusions: Cutting, grinding of stumps to 300mm below ground

sub_elements.title: Demolition of structures
sub_elements.description: Demolition of existing buildings and structures
sub_elements.measurement_rules: Measured by volume, area or mass of material

work_sections.title: Demolition of brick/stone walls
work_sections.description: Breaking down and removal of masonry walls
work_sections.measurement_rules: Measure volume m³ or area m² of walls to be demolished
work_sections.inclusions: All breaking, loading, removal to site boundary

elements.title: Excavation and foundation works
elements.measurement_rules: Measured by volume, length or area

sub_elements.title: Excavation to reduce levels
sub_elements.description: Excavation to reduce ground levels across the site
sub_elements.measurement_rules: Measured by volume m³ of excavation

work_sections.title: Excavation to reduce levels - disposal to spoil heap
work_sections.description: General excavation with spoil moved to on-site heap
work_sections.inclusions: Breaking, excavation, loading, spreading on site

sub_elements.title: Foundation construction
sub_elements.description: Preparation and construction of building foundations
sub_elements.measurement_rules: Measured by linear metre, area or item

work_sections.title: Concrete strip foundations
work_sections.description: Excavation, preparation and concrete strip foundations
work_sections.measurement_rules: Measure linear metres of foundation trenches
work_sections.inclusions: Excavation, blinding concrete, reinforcement, main concrete

groups.title: Superstructure
groups.description: Works above the substructure including frame, floors and roofing

elements.title: Frame and upper floors
elements.description: Structural frame, floors and associated works
elements.measurement_rules: Measured by area, length or mass

sub_elements.title: Masonry and brick walls
sub_elements.measurement_rules: Measured by area m² or volume m³

work_sections.title: Brick and block walls in cement mortar
work_sections.description: Single skin masonry walls in portland cement mortar
work_sections.measurement_rules: Measure area m² of wall face

sub_elements.title: In-situ concrete frames
sub_elements.measurement_rules: Measured by volume m³ or mass tonnes

work_sections.title: In-situ concrete beams and columns
work_sections.description: Supply and construction of reinforced concrete frame elements

elements.title: Roof structure and covering
elements.measurement_rules: Measured by area m² or linear metre

sub_elements.title: Pitched roof structure
sub_elements.measurement_rules: Measured by area m² of roof slope

work_sections.title: Softwood pitched roof trusses
work_sections.description: Factory-made softwood roof trusses to site and install
work_sections.measurement_rules: Measure area m² of roof slope

sub_elements.title: Roof covering
sub_elements.measurement_rules: Measured by area m² of roof

work_sections.title: Plain clay roof tiles
work_sections.description: Supply and laying of plain clay tiles
work_sections.measurement_rules: Measure area m² of tiled roof surface
work_sections.inclusions: Tiles, battens, fixings, labour, mortar bedding to hips/ridges

groups.title: Internal Works
groups.description: Internal walls, partitions, doors and internal finishes

elements.title: Partitions
elements.measurement_rules: Measured by area m² or linear metre

sub_elements.title: Stud partition walls
sub_elements.description: Timber stud partition walls with plasterboard finish
sub_elements.measurement_rules: Measured by area m² of wall face

work_sections.title: Softwood stud partition with plasterboard and skim
work_sections.description: Timber framed stud partition with plasterboard finish
work_sections.measurement_rules: Measure area m² of partition wall both sides

elements.title: Doors and hardware
elements.measurement_rules: Measured by number of doors or linear metre

sub_elements.title: Internal timber doors
sub_elements.description: Supply and hanging of internal doors

work_sections.title: Supply and hang internal softwood doors
work_sections.description: Standard internal timber panelled doors hung on frames
work_sections.measurement_rules: Each door is measured as one item
